column1: Little Goat Diner////Visited Little Goat for lunch with a group of coworkers and had such a nice time! The space was beautiful and bright
column2: and the servers were attentive as soon as we sat down. We started with some appetizers
column3: which were the highlights of the meal in my opinion - goat chili fries and tempura mashed potatoes (technically a side
column4: but still good as a starter). It took some willpower to look past the all-day breakfast
column5: but I went with the BBQ pork sandwich. The slaw was nice and crunchy and the pork tender. We ordered the smoked fries as a side too. Yum. In general
column7: so nearly everyone left with to-go bags. I want to come back to explore the menu and make room for some desserts - saving a star for that visit.
